select , c.name as teamName from pk_member a
LEFT JOIN pk_team_member b on a.id=b.memberid and b.status='1' LEFT JOIN pk_team c on c.ownerid=a.id
LEFT JOIN pk_team_member b on a.id=b.memberid and b.status='1' LEFT JOIN pk_team c on c.id=b.teamid
where 1=1
AND a.type=${type}
AND account like CONCAT('%',#{account},'%')
ORDER BY a.id
